item.description: Hiker Rescue; INC#0829; 02:33PM; 865 Paseo Miramar; MAP: https://bit.ly/3wQzGPl; #PacificPalisades; LAFD responded to an injured hiker in a remote area of Pacific Palisades to find one adult female unable to hike out to her vehicle due to pain/injury. Air Operations will hoist her and transport to a local hospital by air. Nothing further.; FS 23; Batt 9; West Bureau; Council District 11; AO1 BC9 E23 E269 H4 H6 HA4 HA6 RA69 RH114 T69; CH7; 13; Nicholas Prange

KNOCKDOWN Structure Fire; INC#1184; 05:36PM; 6535 N Mary Ellen Av; MAP: https://bit.ly/3wsQFXI; #ValleyGlen; Firefighters arrived to find flames coming from a single-family home, impinging on a neighboring home, which sustained some damage. It took 40 firefighters 44 minutes to extinguish the flames. One patient was transported to the hospital with a minor medical complaint. LAFD Arson investigators are responding to perform the fire cause investigation, which remains active.; FS 102; Batt 14; Valley Bureau; Council District 2; AR1 BC14 CE83 CM40 CM42 E102 E227 E239 E260 E289 E39 E60 E61 E88 E89 PH1 RA102 RA839 T27 T39 T60 T89; CH8; 18; Nicholas Prange

KNOCKDOWN Structure Fire; INC#1163; 04:54PM; 13958 S Fox St; MAP: https://bit.ly/3pBtBSN; #Pacoima; It took 26 firefighters 17 minutes to access, confine, and extinguish the flames. No reported injuries. Cause/loss TBD.; FS 98; Batt 12; Valley Bureau; Council District 7; BC12 E275 E287 E298 E75 E98 RA75 RA91 T75 T87 T98; CH8; 17; Nicholas Prange

Structure Fire; INC#1184; 04:52PM; 6535 N Mary Ellen Av; MAP: https://bit.ly/3wsQFXI; #ValleyGlen; One-story single-family home with fire showing. Offensive mode.; FS 102; Batt 14; Valley Bureau; Council District 2; BC14 E102 E239 E260 E289 E60 E89 RA102 RA839 T39 T60 T89; CH9; 18; Nicholas Prange

Structure Fire; INC#1163; 04:37PM; 13958 S Fox St; MAP: https://bit.ly/3pBtBSN; #Pacoima; One-story home with heavy smoke showing. Offensive mode.; FS 98; Batt 12; Valley Bureau; Council District 7; BC12 E275 E287 E298 E75 E98 RA75 T75 T87 T98; CH9; 17; Nicholas Prange

Structure Fire - Now Out; INC#1029; 03:15PM; 420 S Westlake Av; MAP: https://bit.ly/3KfStZz; #Westlake; Firefighters located a fire (contents only) in one third-floor unit of a five-story center-hallway apartment building. The fire was quickly extinguished and firefighters are now mechanically ventilating the structure (blowers) for smoke removal. No reported injuries related to the fire. Cause under investigation.; FS 11; Batt 11; Central Bureau; Council District 1; BC11 BC5 E13 E20 E203 E211 E220 E29 RA26 SQ21 T11 T20 T3; CH9; 13; Nicholas Prange

KNOCKDOWN Structure Fire; INC#0676; 12:34PM; 3606 W Exposition Bl; MAP: https://bit.ly/3TbIqJ9; Baldwin Hills/Crenshaw; It took 45 firefighters to access, confine, and extinguish the flames in 45 minutes without injury, inside of a one-story vacant commercial building. Cause/loss TBD.; FS 34; Batt 18; South Bureau; Council District 10; BC18 E215 E226 E26 E261 E294 E34 E68 E94 EM18 RA34 T15 T26 T61 T94; CH9; 15; Nicholas Prange

Structure Fire; INC#0676; 11:49AM; 3606 W Exposition Bl; MAP: https://bit.ly/3TbIqJ9; Baldwin Hills/Crenshaw; One-story commercial building (vacant, previous burn) with moderate smoke showing. Offensive mode.; FS 34; Batt 18; South Bureau; Council District 10; BC18 E226 E294 E34 E68 E94 EM18 RA34 T26 T94; CH9; 15; Nicholas Prange

#EasternFire - Contained - Brush Fire; INC#0207; 05:50AM; 2651 N Lombardy Bl; MAP: https://bit.ly/3pWENcV; #ElSereno; Precise helicopter water drops and well-coordinated ground operations have fully contained this fire to an estimated ten acres of grass and light brush in 65 minutes. No injury. No structure damage. No evacuation. The cause of the blaze, which began as three separate spot fires, is under active investigation. ; FS 16; Batt 2; Central Bureau; Council District 14; AR1 BC1 BC11 BC2 BP47 CM20 CM22 E1 E12 E13 E14 E16 E17 E20 E201 E202 E209 E21 E212 E25 E290 E3 E42 E44 E52 E55 E56 E6 E90 EM1 H1 H3 H5 HA1 HA3 HA5 RA12 RA47 RA90 T1 T12 T2 T90; CH5; 13; Brian Humphrey

Update #EasternFire Brush Fire; INC#0207; 05:30AM; 2651 N Lombardy Bl; MAP: https://bit.ly/3pWENcV; #ElSereno; This incident, known as the "Eastern Fire' is terrain-driven (no wind), and now believed to have consumed as many as 6 acres of light grass, and is NOT currently threatening any homes. ; FS 16; Batt 2; Central Bureau; Council District 14; BC1 BC11 BC2 BP47 CM20 CM22 E1 E12 E13 E14 E16 E17 E20 E201 E202 E209 E21 E212 E25 E3 E42 E44 E52 E55 E56 E6 E90 EM1 H1 H3 H5 HA1 HA3 HA5 RA12 RA47 RA90 T1 T12 T2; CH5; 13; Brian Humphrey
